alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Box Butte, Scotts Bluff, west central Morrill, northeastern Banner, southern Sioux and southeastern Goshen Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stegall to near Scotts Bluff National Monument to Wildcat Hills Campground. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Gering, Mitchell, Bayard, Terrytown, Morrill, Minatare, Lyman, Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area, Lake Minatare Campground, Chimney Rock State Park, Stegall, Wildcat Hills Campground, Scotts Bluff National Monument, Hubbard Hill, Moomaws Corner, Scottsbluff Airport, Lake Minatare, South Bayard Junction and Lake Alice. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
